instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Bahasa (Indonesian) language.
input: He then promised that as president he would hunt Osama bin Laden to the "gates of hell."

input: This skin, currently used on Wikinews, will be enabled for Wikipedia on April 5th and provide a more updated look and feel.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the English language, your task is to convert it into the Bahasa (Indonesian) language.
input: Their plans were foiled, however, and Mann was arrested after arriving in Zimbabwe to purchase firearms and grenades.
